page.title: 14Appliances in Eckington.
page.content: We did an electrical and gas appliance survey. Out of the whole class we found that nearly everybody had a colour TV and everybody had a telephone. Nobody had an electric toothbrush, and very few people had electric blankets or Teasmades. Only five people had a hedge cutter, strimmer and a liquidiser. Most people had a freezer, clock, hair dryer, kettle, cooker,iron and a radio. Our gas survey shows that many people had gas central heating. Eight people had gas stoves, ten people had gas fires and boilers . Nobody had a gas fridge.
